info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 8 at 10:12PM EDT until June 12 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River at Edwardsport.
White River at Elliston.
Wabash River at Montezuma.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana...
White River at Petersburg.
White River at Hazleton.
Wildcat Creek near Lafayette.
Mississinewa River near Ridgeville.
.Rainfall amounts within the past few days of two to four inches across central Indiana is producing minor flooding along the White River as well as Wildcat Creek and Mississinewa River. Additional rainfall of up to an inch is possible through tomorrow night.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Edwardsport.
* WHEN...Until late Thursday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flooding closes Old Vincennes Road. High water crosses SR 358 on the Daviess County side just west of the levee. Flooding begins to affect higher bottomlands. Residential property of river cabins begins to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EDT Sunday /6:00 PM CDT Sunday/ the stage was 16.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EDT Sunday /6:00 PM CDT Sunday/ was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.1 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued Monday afternoon by around 1230 PM EDT /1130 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Gibson, IN; Knox, IN; Pike, IN
